actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands

official_title: To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to lease certain lands within Fort Pulaski National Monument, and for other purposes.
short_title: Fort Pulaski National Monument Lease Authorization Act

summary.text: Fort Pulaski National Monument Lease Authorization Act - Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to lease to the Savannah Bar Pilots Association or a successor organization up to 30,000 square feet of land and improvements in Fort Pulaski National Monument in Georgia at the location on Cockspur Island that has been used continuously by the Association since 1940.

titles.title: Fort Pulaski National Monument Lease Authorization Act
To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to lease certain lands within Fort Pulaski National Monument, and for other purposes.
